entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 18.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Erieau 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
Temperature: 18.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 15.9°C
Wind: SW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 30 except 24 near Lake Erie. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 30 except 24 near Lake Erie. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 28 except 23 near Lake Erie. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High 28 except 23 near Lake Erie. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
